thread.title: Jan Johnson

author: Jan Johnson
title: Jan Johnson
text: I really can't fault Torfx or my account manager, Jason Forbes. The process itself took the anguish out of the transfer of (for me) a significant lump sum. Jason's attentiveness to my needs, his follow up and attention to detail are to be commended. Jason's calm demeanour in dealing with my own bank which was, to say the least, tardy with its responses, was reassuring at a particularly stressful time.
